author: olegk
msg: Added an HTTP client handler implementation that allocates fixed size content buffers upon initialization and is capable of throttling the rate of I/O events in order to guarantee those content buffers do not ever get overflown

msg: HADOOP-1311.  Fix a bug in BytesWritable#set() where the start offset was ignored.  Contributed by Dhruba.
